reviewText:
My husband is in the oil field, so I bought this video for him to put in his stocking. It was horrible. It is actually the ultimate white elephant gift at this point. He tried to re-gift it, the person gave it back.
This is a one act play, by a lady, that I am positive might be semi-interesting in a class room setting............good luck to anyone who buys it. Hope you find more resourceful than we did.
